page.title: 20Spernall_Electrical Equip.
page.content:
What items of electrical equipment do you have in your house? See also pages 18 and 19. OTHER items listed included: Personal stereo Carving knife Fan heater Soldering iron Heated rollers Railway Sander Deep fat frier Circular saw Tape recorder Jig saw Clothes airer Organ Radiator Sandwich toaster Tumble drier Hostess trolley Coffee grinder Sewing machine Microwave cooker Night storage heater Waste disposal Clock unit Strimmer Teasmade Hedge cutter Slow cooker Razor Hot brush NO ONE OWNED A COMPUTER!!!
Author _Miss Penelope Jutson.
